properties.name: Lin Xiu
properties.health_status: Heterochromia (left eye golden, right eye brown)
properties.personality: Skilled in psychological manipulation, always wears a glove on the left hand

relationships.new_detail: Lin Xiu openly acknowledges Chen's investigative efforts and threatens direct confrontation

Su Mingyue
relationships.type: Debt relationship (Lin Xiu owes Su Mingyue a huge medical bill)

events.details: Chen serves drinks at officer's game, noticing Lin's micro-expressions change when temporal stabilizer is mentioned
consequences: Confirms Lin's knowledge of future events through betting patterns
Photographs Lin's special chips with UV-sensitive phone

events.details: Chen deliberately spills drink on Lin, revealing temporal energy sparks - prompting violent reaction
consequences: Su administers sedative proving effective against temporal anomalies
